# https://itumor.github.io/Me
> Portfolio for Ibrahim (Ebrahim) Timor — AWS & Kubernetes cloud architect focused on secure, automated, cost-efficient platforms across EU/EMEA.

## Profile
- [Home](https://itumor.github.io/Me/): Overview, positioning, key focus areas (AWS/EKS, GitOps, FinOps/GreenOps, multi-account foundations).
- [Profile section](https://itumor.github.io/Me/#brand): How he works, open-to-collaboration areas, impact snapshots.

## Projects
- [Projects](https://itumor.github.io/Me/#projects): Case studies including AWS platform modernization, Elastic Path migration to Kubernetes, big data platform accelerator.

## Experience
- [Experience](https://itumor.github.io/Me/#experience): Roles at Accenture Baltics, C.T.Co, Accenture, Dematic/Advansys with bullet outcomes (landing zones, GitOps, CAST AI optimization, migrations).

## Certifications
- [Certifications](https://itumor.github.io/Me/#certifications): AWS SAA, CKA, CKAD, KCNA, SAFe Practitioner, CCNA, CAST AI (Workload Optimization, Container Live Migration).

## Education
- [Education](https://itumor.github.io/Me/#education): B.Sc. Electrical & Computer Engineering, Higher Technological Institute (2005–2010).

## Contact
- [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/ebrahim-ramadan/): Primary contact.

## Q&A
- Who is Ibrahim (Ebrahim) Timor? AWS & Kubernetes cloud architect in Riga focused on secure, automated, cost-efficient platforms. [Profile](https://itumor.github.io/Me/#brand)
